title: Wanted: One old judge baseball card
author: T206

posts.post_title: Wanted: One old judge baseball card
posts.post_content: I am buying any old judge baseball card for $65 or less, PLEASE POST OR EMAIL ME AT [url]percussiondj@gmail.com[/url]
any old judge card, DOES NOT NEED TO BE GRADED

I'd buy every single PSA 1 that I could find at your price of $65.

At that price you should be looking for an Old Judge beater, something thats been trimmed and the back skinned off.
The old judge card can be trimmed or bent

[quote name="cozmokramer" post=757602]I'd buy every single PSA 1 that I could find at your price of $65.

At that price you should be looking for an Old Judge beater, something thats been trimmed and the back skinned off.[/QUOTE]

or missing corners. the lowest i have seen one go is $80
wow the lowest i have seen them go off is 30 to 40 dollars in pretty good condition
I am buying any old judge beater for $75 or less
